About Courtney

Let's design your perfect hair! I love to be creative and make your hair dreams come true. I completed cosmetology school in 2005 and have over 15 years of experience specializing in color, color correction, and extensions.

Book Now

Schedule an appointment online for the Salt Lake City or Farmington location.

Book Now

Cancellations Policy

Free cancellation or rescheduling at least 1 day before your appointment.

No-Show or same day cancellations are subject to a fee of 50% appointment cost.

Late (15 minutes or later) appointments may be canceled, rescheduled, or subject to a fee.

Client Photos

Recent customer photos can be found on my Instagram Page. You can also view them directly in the Instagram App. More information can be found on my Facebook Page.
